root: ^While ghost facial expressions are almost entirely uninterpretable, you feel as though you might be able to make out a slight frown.

c-1: ^Just thought I'd ask, you look a little bit like her

c-0: ^Well everyone looks just about the same when they're a ghost, don't they? It still feels to me like I look the same though, somehow.
^But no, to clear things up for you, I have a feeling that I'm probably not your mother.

replay: ^Would you like some of my lemonade?
^do you know where my mother is?

c-0: ^You know, that sounds delicious. I would love a taste.
^Edith takes the lemonade and pours a little into her mouth. It falls through her directly onto the floor.

b: ^ Oh, so now because I look like her we must be friends?
^Oh, what a terrible thing to be separated.

c-1: ^No, I don't think I have. You might try looking further down the train though, I know a few folks ended up over there.
